name: ConverseAnimalShelter
0:
”Alexa, open Converse Animal Shelter”
”Alexa, ask Converse Animal Shelter for the latest update”
”Alexa, start Converse Animal Shelter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: converse animal shelter
des: Listen to the latest news and information from Converse Animal Shelter. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
